name: TypeScript 2.4
body:
For release notes, check out the [release announcement](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/typescript/2017/06/27/announcing-typescript-2-4) 

For new features, check out the [What's new in TypeScript 2.4](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/What's-new-in-TypeScript#typescript-24).

For breaking changes, check out the [Breaking changes in TypeScript 2.4](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/Breaking-Changes#typescript-24) page.

For the complete list of fixed issues, check out the [fixed issues query for Typescript 2.4](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22TypeScript+2.4%22+label%3A%22fixed%22+).

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)
- [Visual Studio 2015 plugin](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48593)
- [Visual Studio 2017](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=55258) (Select new version in [Tools/Options](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/TypeScript-Side-by-Side-Support-in-Visual-Studio-2017-(15.2)))
- [NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.TypeScript.MSBuild/2.4.0)

name: TypeScript 2.3.4
body:
This release includes a [new flag for tsserver](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/15287) to specify location of npm for nvm users.

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)

name: TypeScript 2.3.3
body:
This release include a set of bug fixes reported against [TypeScript 2.3.2](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/releases/tag/v2.3.2). For the complete list of fixed issues, check out the [fixed issues query for TypeScript 2.3.3](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22TypeScript+2.3.3%22+label%3A%22fixed%22+).

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)
- [Visual Studio 2015 plugin](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48593)
- [NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.TypeScript.MSBuild/2.3.3)

name: TypeScript 2.3.2
body:
This release includes a [fix to an inadvertent API breaking change affecting WebStorm & Intellij IDEA](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/15433) released part of TypeScript 2.3.1.

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)

name: TypeScript 2.2

For new features, check out the [What's new in TypeScript 2.2](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/What's-new-in-TypeScript#typescript-22).

name: TypeScript 2.0.8
body:
This release includes a [targeted fix](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/12047) for monitoring automatically acquired type definitions. 

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)

name: TypeScript 2.0.7
body:
This release includes a [targeted fix](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/pull/12014) for declaration file acquisition to use a local copy of [types-registry](https://www.npmjs.com/package/types-registry) to find `@types` packages instead of querying npm. 

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)

name: TypeScript 2.0.6
body:
This release include a set of bug fixes reported against [TypeScript 2.0.3](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/releases/tag/v2.0.3):
- [TypeScript Tools for VS 2015 2.0.2.0 Beta not working (on Windows Server 2012)](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11110)
- [2x compilation slowdown when upgrading from TS1.8 => TS2.0](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/10018)
- [tsc.exe doesn't work on Windows Server 2012](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11339)
- [Script failed with error : 'JsErrorScriptException (0x30001)' during MSBuild](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/9720)
- [Visual Studio 2015 crashing when editing typescript file while solution is running and a dynamic code file is open](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11585)
- [Less-than comparison raising error with JSX](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11081)
- [Generated declaration missing generic](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11035)
- [define get set bug](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11384)
- [Tsserver crashes if a directiory in `include` array doesn't exist](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11568)
- [TSServer broken with path mappings & empty include](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/10321)
- [Exclude isn't working in TypeScript 2.0.2](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11055)
- [Regression: Matched argument name and name of exported function breaks module export](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11204)
- [Completion list showing bogus completions](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11217)
- [Go-to-definition doesn't work on path in calls to 'require'](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/9251)
- [Inappropriate string literal completions in object literals](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11232)
- [Could the tsserver add `process.noAsar = true;`](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11348)
- [TypeError: Cannot read property 'export=' of undefined from ./node_modules\typescript\lib\tsc.js](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/11211)

For the complete list of fixed issues, check out the [fixed issues query for TypeScript 2.0.6](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22TypeScript+2.0.6%22+label%3A%22fixed%22+).

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)
- [Visual Studio 2015 plugin](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48593)
- [NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.TypeScript.MSBuild/2.0.6)

name: TypeScript 2.0.5
body:
TypeScript 2.0.5 is released as part of [Visual Studio "15" Preview 5](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/visualstudio/2016/10/05/announcing-visual-studio-15-preview-5/). Check out the [VS release notes](https://www.visualstudio.com/news/releasenotes/vs15-relnotes#javascripttypescript) for more information.

This release mainly targets getting Visual Studio to use [tsserver](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/blob/master/lib/tsserver.js). For the complete list of changes check out the [closed issues in Typescript 2.0.5](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22TypeScript+2.0.5%22+label%3A%22fixed%22+) query.

name: TypeScript 2.0.3
body:
For release notes, and links to installing for various platforms, check out the [release announcement](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/typescript/2016/09/22/announcing-typescript-2-0/)

For new features, check out the [What's new in TypeScript 2.0](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/What's-new-in-TypeScript#typescript-20).

For breaking changes, check out the [Breaking changes in TypeScript 2.0](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/Breaking-Changes#typescript-20) page.

For the complete list of fixed issues, check out the [fixed issues query for TypeScript 2.0](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22TypeScript+2.0%22+label%3A%22fixed%22+), [TypeScript 2.0.2](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22TypeScript+2.0.2%22+label%3A%22fixed%22+) and [TypeScript 2.0.3](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22TypeScript+2.0.3%22+label%3A%22fixed%22+).

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)
- [Visual Studio 2015 plugin](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48593) (requires [VS 2015 Update 3](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt752379.aspx) to be installed first)

name: TypeScript 2.0 RC
body:
For release notes, and links to installing for various platforms, check out the [release announcement](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/typescript/2016/08/30/announcing-typescript-2-0-rc/)

For new features, check out the [What's new in TypeScript 2.0](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/What's-new-in-TypeScript#typescript-20).

For breaking changes, check out the [Breaking changes in TypeScript 2.0](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/Breaking-Changes#typescript-20) page.

For the complete list of fixed issues, check out the  [fixed issues since Typescript 2.0 Beta](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22TypeScript+2.0.2%22+label%3A%22fixed%22+).

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)
- [Visual Studio 2015 plugin](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48593) (requires [VS 2015 Update 3](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt752379.aspx) to be installed first)
- [NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.TypeScript.MSBuild/2.0.2-rc)

name: TypeScript 2.0 Beta
body:
For release notes, and links to installing for various platforms, check out the [release announcement](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/typescript/2016/07/11/announcing-typescript-2-0-beta/)

For new features, check out the [What's new in TypeScript 2.0](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/What's-new-in-TypeScript#typescript-20).

For breaking changes, check out the [Breaking changes in TypeScript 2.0](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/Breaking-Changes#typescript-20) page.

For the complete list of fixed issues, check out the [fixed issues query for TypeScript 2.0](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22TypeScript+2.0%22+label%3A%22fixed%22+).

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)
- [Visual Studio 2015 plugin](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48593) (requires [VS 2015 Update 3](https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/news/releasenotes/vs2015-update3-vs) to be installed first)
- [NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.TypeScript.MSBuild/2.0.0-beta)

name: TypeScript 1.8.9
body:
> Note: This release has the version tag of `1.8.9.0` for NuGet and npm and `1.8.29.0` for Visual Studio 2015.

For the complete list of changes in this release, check out the fixed issues query for [TypeScript 1.8.9](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22TypeScript+1.8.9%22+label%3A%22fixed%22+)

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)
- [Visual Studio 2015 plugin included in Update2](https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/news/vs2015-update2-vs.aspx)
- [NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.TypeScript.MSBuild/1.8.9)

name: TypeScript 1.8.10
body:
> Note: This release has the version tag of 1.8.10.0 for NuGet and npm and 1.8.31.0 for Visual Studio 2015.

This release fixes [an issue in React 15.0 and later](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/7270) by removing a dependency on an internal React API when emitting JSX spread attributes. As a result, TypeScript now emits its own standalone helper function for spread attributes.

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)
- [NuGet](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.TypeScript.MSBuild/1.8.10)

name: TypeScript 1.8.5
body:
> Note: This release has the version tag of `1.8.5.0` for Visual Studio 2013, `1.8.6.0` for NuGet and Visual Studio 2015 and `1.8.7.0` for npm

This release includes the following fixes:
- [Performance problem with `--declaration` `--noEmitOnError` and `--outFile` ](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/7221)
- [Invalid this reference inside arrow function](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/7212)
- [File paths in tsconfig exclude are not respected in MSBuild projects](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/7198)

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)
- [Visual Studio 2015 plugin](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48593)
- [Visual Studio 2013 plugin](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48739)
- [NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.TypeScript.MSBuild/1.8.6)

name: TypeScript 1.8.2
body:
For release notes, and links to installing for various platforms, check out the [release announcement](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/typescript/2016/02/22/announcing-typescript-1-8-2)

> Note: This release has the version tag of `1.8.2.0` for npm and Visual Studio 2013 and `1.8.4.0` for NuGet and Visual Studio 2015

For new features, checkout the [what's new in TypeScript 1.8](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/What's-new-in-TypeScript#typescript-18) page.

For breaking changes, check out the [Breaking changes in TypeScript 1.8](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/Breaking-Changes#typescript-18) page.

For the complete list of fixed issues, check out the fixed issues query for [TypeScript 1.8](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22TypeScript+1.8%22+label%3A%22fixed%22+) and [TypeScript 1.8.2](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22TypeScript+1.8.2%22+label%3A%22fixed%22+).

Download:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript)
- [Visual Studio 2015 plugin](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48593)
- [Visual Studio 2013 plugin](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48739)
- [NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.TypeScript.MSBuild/1.8.4)

name: TypeScript 1.7.5
body:
This release addresses the following issues:
- [MSBuild tooling errors in web application publish](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/5894)
- [Slowdown in compiling complicated union types](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/5849)
- [TS Server opens too many file watcher instances](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/6016)
